channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1461503888234717186
item.description:
For the first time in history one can access all* the CA #waterrights #waterdata data from eWRIMS in the form of 17 flat files published as #machinereadable #OpenData resources. @MaestuRafael & team spent 4+ years on this! Huge.
https://t.co/MxFxQUaKXP https://t.co/3V4tNd74Ia

item.title: #en @ 1461461088072089614
item.description:
I can't say this enough:
NYC has such a wealth of research and information we were able to build on & #opendata we could analyze - its amazing!
I think the level of detail in #StateoftheUrbanForestNYC would be tough, if not impossible to include for most other cities https://t.co/LHjjX4UPft

item.title: #en @ 1461444830672818180
item.description:
As was said months ago. For some reason we continue to build delays in data metrics here in #Germany.
#Corona data, open data, vaccinations, child vaccinations, hospital data, registered deaths.
Political? Technological? Ideological? Either way, no way to deal with disasters. https://t.co/ONQm2k2vby

item.title: #en @ 1461411032425906178
item.description:
Interested in detailed #opendata elevation information for #bcfloods? See the #LidarBC - Open #LiDAR Data Portal. DEM, DSM, and point clouds. 1:2500 scale. #laser #bcflood2021 #bcflooding #openaccess
Background on data and download 🔗: https://t.co/TAa4uEC2Ep https://t.co/ouq2aFH37x

item.title: #es @ 1461369788869926918
item.description:
⚖️El parlamento abierto se reconoce por:
✅Datos abiertos ✅documentos que sustenten toma de decisiones ✅Participación ciudadana
A nivel Latinoamérica aún falta mucho por hacer. Entendamos: el actor principal de la democracia es el ciudadano
@JCRomeroHicks-@Mx_Diputados https://t.co/83cm8YHhOO

item.title: #it @ 1461357515141095438
item.description: A ottobre avevamo evidenziato alcune criticità sui dati pubblicati dal governo sul Pnrr. Oggi registriamo un ulteriore passo indietro. Per questo chiediamo che venga sospesa la pubblicazione della sezione open data del portale Italia domani. https://t.co/FhYsPuEGSi

item.title: #en @ 1461350155395878925
item.description:
Our group finally has a website! Still needs a few final touches, but almost there.
https://t.co/5FUvEKkVij
Really proud to include our Code of Conduct, and over 220 GB of open data.

item.title: #en @ 1461340669805535236
item.description: @ECDC_EU @EUCouncil @EMA_News @EU_Health @EFSA_EU @EU_opendata @WHO_Europe @EU_Commission @EUCouncilPress @SKyriakidesEU @EU_ECHA . Clearly something is not working with regard to the implementation of the ECDC guidelines https://t.co/YUaelIXB8G; cases are reported by MS irrespectively of symptoms, and influenza is mixed and melt with COVID. Such a Map cannot be therefore authoritative to adopt decisions

item.description: @svpino Open Data management tools are the future for all data scientists, analytics, and data engineers. Data is hard. Distributed data is.. extremely difficult to grasp, support and manage.

item.title: #es @ 1461140810607566849
item.description:
¿Efecto Post #halloween2021 🇵🇪 ? #Covid_19 #DatosAbiertos A escala nacional: Promedio diario de casos de 740 a 1,000 en dos semanas. Siendo más notorio en las pruebas moleculares: de 280 a 460 en el mismo período, y la positividad lentamente de 2% a 3%
#NoBajemosLaGuardia https://t.co/9rkoPc8Xl7

item.title: #ca @ 1460928296972132357

item.title: #th @ 1460926252534034433
item.description: เกือบ10ปี ที่เผด็จการกดหยุดนาฬิกาของอปท.ไว้ 28 พ.ย. เลือกตั้งอบต. ไปใช้สิทธิ์กันนะคะ ไปเลือกอาหารกลางวันที่ดีให้เด็ก ๆ ไปเลือกน้ำประปาที่สะอาด ไปเลือก Public Space มองหา ไปเลือก Open Data ที่จะช่วยหยุดการทุจริต อย่าให้ใครขโมยอนาคตของเราไปอีก #เปลี่ยนประเทศนี้เริ่มที่บ้านเรา https://t.co/FDp1NRvEM6

item.description:
A Vision 👓:

item.title: #en @ 1460680374653227016
item.description:
For a city with an open data portal, there sure is a lot of missing information.
I was glancing at the traffic enforcement data for the year... and, yeah, If I have to read “no value” one more time…
